  Link our compensation programs with the interests of our stockholders through stock -based 
compensation  
Consistent with these objectives, an average of 70 percent of the total potential pay we awarded our 
named executive officers in 2011 was in the form of long -term stock -based compensation. As a result of 
our Chapter 11 fili ng and delisting of our shares, we anticipate that the future value of the long -term stock -
based compensation awarded to them in 2011 and prior years will be minimal.  
Detailed information regarding AMR's executive compensation, including the process used t o determine 
compensation, is available in our 2011 10 -K, beginning on page 115.
